name: Super RAGE Platformer
description:
Multiple Levels

4 unique rage levels for you to lose your sh*t

Annoying Spikes

So many great spikes in every level to make you rage quit and b*tch at the developer  

Controls

Left/Right arrow keys to move Left/Right

Up arrow to jump

Down arrow to pass through platforms

Space Bar to shoot arrows

GIFS :D
